units.install-pint: Looks like pint is not installed
units.install-pint-description: Install it with "pip install pint" and restart launcher

currency.provider-error: Currency Provider error. Did you set your API key?
currency.provider-error-description: Set your API key in the extension preferences
currency.install-requests: Looks like requests is not installed.
currency.install-requests-description: Install it with "pip install requests" and restart launcher.

time.years-overflow: Hey I'm not a time machine
time.years-overflow-description: Are you trying to crash me?
time.install-parsedatetime: Looks like parsedatetime is not installed.
time.install-parsedatetime-description: Install it with "pip install parsedatetime" and restart launcher.

calculator.query-boolean: Query has boolean representation (1 = True, 0 = False)
calculator.infinite-result: Creating a black hole aren't we?
calculator.infinite-result-description: Looks like you divided by zero somewhere
calculator.boolean-comparison-error: Complex numbers can't be inequally compared
calculator.boolean-comparison-error-description: You tried to compare a complex number with another number. That's illegal
calculator.boolean-percentage-error-description: You cannot compute percentages of boolean variables
calculator.install-simpleeval: Looks like simpleeval is not installed.
calculator.install-simpleeval-description: Install it with "pip install simpleeval" and restart launcher.

misc.no-result-description: Try expressions like "10 euros to dollars", "sqrt(10) + 2 ^ 2.5", "20 cm to inches"
